title: GTA VI referencing real life #gta #gaming
Justice League: Crisis on Infinite Earths Part 1 - Official Trailer (2023) Jensen Ackles
description:
Death is coming. Worse than death: oblivion. Not just for our Earth, but for everyone, everywhere, in every universe! Against this ultimate destruction, the mysterious Monitor has gathered the greatest team of Super Heroes ever assembled. But what can the combined might of Superman, Wonder Woman, Batman, The Flash, Green Lantern and hundreds of Super Heroes from multiple Earths even do to save all of reality from an unstoppable antimatter Armageddon?!

Produced by Warner Bros. Animation, DC and Warner Bros. Home Entertainment, the all-new, action-packed DC animated film features some of DC’s most famous Super Heroes from multiple universes including Batman, Superman and Wonder Woman, who come together to stop an impending threat of doom and destruction. The film will be available to purchase exclusively on digital on January 9 and on 4K UHD in limited edition steelbook packaging and Blu-ray on January 23.

#IGN #DC #Movies

title: Halo Infinite Season 5 - Official Firefight: King of the Hill Launch Trailer
description:
Halo Infinite is welcoming back a return of a legendary Halo mode with Firefight: King of the Hill alongside Season 5: Reckoning. The iconic mode offers a new and refreshing twist on the beloved co-op wave-survival mode, where players fight to survive against hordes of Banished enemies, each wave stronger than the one that preceded it. Season 5: Reckoning for Halo Infinite also ushers in the new Repair Field equipment, Forge updates, Ranked and Custom Game Browser improvements, and more for players to enjoy. Halo Infinite Season 5: Reckoning launches with Firefight: King of the Hill on December 5 for Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Xbox Game Pass, and PC.

#ign #gaming #haloinfinite

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - Official Season 1 Zombies Trailer
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 is bringing in new zombies content with the release of Season 1. Massive gateways have appeared in the Exclusion Zone transporting players to the Dark Aether. Players will need to investigate the area and survive the new end-game content as best they can with pack-a-punched weaponry and Ray Guns alike. The new zombies content coming with Season 1 for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 will be available on December 6.

#ign #gaming #cod

title: Sonic Dream Team - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Sonic Dream Team is available now on Apple Arcade. See gameplay and more in this launch trailer for Sonic Dream Team as Sonic, Knuckles, and more friends embark on a new 3D action platformer adventure as they dive deep into the bizarre world of Eggman’s dreams.

#ign #gaming #sonic

title: Arizona Sunshine 2 Review
description:
Arizona Sunshine 2 reviewed by Dan Stapleton on PC via Meta Quest 3 + Steam Link and Valve Index. Also available on Meta Quest 2/3 and PlayStation VR 2.

Time and time again, Arizona Sunshine 2 expertly ramps up the pressure of oncoming hordes of zombies and then rewards you with spectacular gore when your bullets and hatchets connect with rotten faces. Its VR shooting and relatively complex reloading mean you always have to be on your toes and thinking about how many bullets are left in your guns as you blast your way through a lengthy, occasionally poignant story about a man and his new four-legged best buddy. The variety of enemy types is pretty limited for a 15-plus-hour game, but there’s enough light puzzle-solving and climbing mixed in to keep it moving along, and the physics glitches provide as much humor as the one-liners and co-op antics.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 & Warzone - Official Season 1 BlackCell Battle Pass Trailer
description:
Players of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone will be able to purchase the Season 1 BlackCell Battle Pass for the latest installment in the Call of Duty franchise and Warzone experience. The BlackCell Battle Pass is fitted with a new operator named Abolisher, 10 alternate BlackCell skins, 6 alternate weapon blueprints, and 20+ tier skips in the Season 1 Battle Pass. The Season 1 BlackCell Battle Pass upgrade for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone is launching on December 6.

#CallOfDuty #Gaming #Warzone

title: Wonka Review
description:
Wonka reviewed by Tom Jorgensen.

Wonka is a celebration of music makers and the dreamers of dreams, a big, old-fashioned movie musical that uses Roald Dahl’s world just judiciously enough to avoid any serious hits to the author or Gene Wilder’s legacy. Timothée Chalamet’s portrayal of Willy Wonka is most successful in its earnestness, and Chalamet brings the character to life with a gleeful abandon that makes him easy to root for, along with an energetic supporting cast who end up carrying the banner of Wonka’s weirdness more than Wonka himself. Charming and well-staged musical numbers give the movie enough of an identity of its own to make it worthy of a taste – just remember to burp and fart if you start floating toward the ceiling at any time during your screening.

#IGN #Movies #Wonka

title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds: Season 2 Exclusive Deleted Scene (2023) Ethan Peck, Rebecca Romijn
description:
Number One (Rebecca Romijn) introduces a fully human Spock (Ethan Peck) to chewing gum in this deleted scene from Episode 5 of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds: Season 2.

Star Trek: Strange New Worlds Season 2 is now available on 4K UHD, Blu-ray, and DVD. It is also available on 4K UHD and Blu-ray Steelbooks.

#StarTrek #StarTrekStrangeNewWorldsSeason2 #StarTrekStrangeNewWorlds

title: The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered's Roguelike Mode Is More Than Just a Novelty
description:
We went hands-on with The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered's brand new roguelike mode, No Return.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Arizona Sunshine 2 - Official Launch Trailer
description: Arizona Sunshine 2 is available now on PlayStation VR2 and Steam VR for pre-orders of the deluxe edition, and the zombie slaying, first-person VR action game sequel will officially be available on December 7, 2023 on Meta Quest, PS VR2, Steam VR, and Pico platforms. Watch the brutal launch trailer for Arizona Sunshine 2 to meet Buddy, your canine pal, see zombie meet their end, and some of the features you can expect, including a two-player co-op campaign mode and an endless Horde mode for up to four players.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria - Official PS5 Launch Trailer
description:
Watch the The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria PS5 launch trailer. LotR Return to Moria is a survival crafting video game developed by Free Range Games. Players will experience the Fourth Age of Middle-earth that goes beyond the J.R.R. Tolkien books where they will assemble Dwarves tasked to reclaim the lost spoils from the Dwarven homeland of Moria in the depths below their very feet. Conserve resources, hunt and gather for food, and more to survive in the dark along with crafting tools and weapons to aid their expedition. The PlayStation 5 release for The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is packed with quality-of-life updates, bug fixes, improved overall performance, and more.

The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is available now for PlayStation 5 alongside the PC release with a release for Xbox Series S|X set for early 2024.

#LordOfTheRings #Gaming #IGN

title: Bob Marley: One Love - Official Trailer (2024) Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch
description:
Check out the trailer for Bob Marley: One Love to see star Kingsley Ben-Adir's transformation as Bob Marley in this upcoming movie about the life and music of the icon. The film also stars Lashana Lynch as Bob Marley's wife Rita, James Norton, Tosin Cole, Umi Myers, Anthony Welsh, Nia Ashi, Aston Barrett Jr., Anna-Sharé Blake, Gawaine “J-Summa” Campbell, Naomi Cowan, Alexx A-Game, Michael Gandolfini, Quan-Dajai Henriques, David Kerr, Hector Roots Lewis, Abijah “Naki Wailer” Livingston, Nadine Marshall, Sheldon Shepherd, Andrae Simpson, and Stefan A.D Wade.

Bob Marley: One Love celebrates the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love and unity. On the big screen for the first time, discover Bob’s powerful story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music. Bob Marley: One Love is produced in partnership with the Marley family. It is produced by Robert Teitel, p.g.a., Dede Gardner,p.g.a., Jeremy Kleiner, p.g.a., Ziggy Marl

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition - Official Launch Trailer (ft. Keanu Reeves, Idris Elba)
description:
Check out the Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition trailer, featuring Keanu Reeves (Johnny Silverhand) and Idris Elba (Solomon Reed).

Return to the neon-colored streets of Night City in this open-world, action-adventure RPG. Play as V, a cyberpunk mercenary, and take on the most powerful forces of the city in a fight for glory and survival. Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition features the base game, the spy-thriller expansion Phantom Liberty, and update 2.0. 

Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition is out now on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Cyberpunk2077

title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora: How a Single Scene Was Created | Concept to Controller
description:
Here's how the Avatar Frontiers of Pandora Ikran scene was created! Ubisoft’s Avatar game offers us all the chance to visit the lush, forested homeworld of the Na’vi. And, at the very top of a floating mountain, you’ll be able to live out your own version of an iconic Avatar scene: taming and flying an Ikran.

But just as important as the Avatar Ikran scene and flight is the journey to the mountain’s summit; a climb full of incredible views, plants with strange abilities, and puzzles to solve. That climb is the centrepiece of the Avatar Take Flight quest, one of the Frontiers of Pandora milestone missions. It’s the work of dozens of developers, and we’ve spoken to several of them to find out how they made it. 

For more developer insights on Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, take a look at why the developers chose the first-person perspective: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Es2KioY2YdM

And how the Na’vi and human weapons offer differing gameplay styles: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=

title: Is Troy Baker in GTA VI? 🤔

title: The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered - Official No Return Mode Trailer
description:
Experience The Last of Us Part II Remastered's deep combat via an entirely new single-player mode! Survive as long as you can in each run, as you choose your path through a series of randomized encounters featuring different foes and memorable locations from throughout Part II, all culminating in intense boss battles.
Play as Ellie, Abby, and a variety of unlockable characters, including never-before-playable characters like Dina, Jesse, Lev, Tommy, and more, each with unique traits to offer a variety of playstyles, and unlock skins for them as you progress to use in the mode.

Available on PS5 January 19, 2024. Pre-orders start on December 5, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Live-Action Fallout Creators Call Show "Fallout 5" - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description:
In today's Fix of entertainment news:
Jonathan Nolan, showrunner for Prime Video's Fallout series, said the show creators consider their live-action Fallout to be Fallout 5. While Bethesda hasn't confirmed whether or not the story in the Fallout show is actually Fallout 5 cannonically, they did tease a new Fallout game sometime down the road. Like, way down the road, as in sometime after The Elder Scrolls 6. In other news, Marvel Studios head Kevin Feige confirmed he has no plans to bring back Robert Downey, Jr's Iron Man. But we are getting a new kind of Iron Man in the form of Iron Heart and her Disney+ series. And finally, Zack Snyder has acquired the rights to a sequel to a movie he made more than a decade ago. Snyder may have plans to finally produce his version of a sequel to 300, and it may follow Alexander the Great. There was a sequel to 300 released—Rise of an Empire—but Snyder didn't have much to do with that movie.

title: The GTA 6 Announcement Was So Big, Everyone’s Copying It - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Rockstar's Grand Theft Auto 6 announcement was so huge, everyone's parodying it: from Rare, to Microsoft, to Activision. In other news, Sony has announced that it is pulling some PlayStation video content from the store, and from people's libraries even if they bought it. It has to do with licensing rights, but that's not consoling users who paid money for content.
